name: Vegifighter
description:
Vegifighter is a score-attack game which revolves around slicing up vegetables.

Hitting multiple vegetables at once results in a combo, making combos will level up your character and gains them access to new abilities.


Choose one of three different classes; ninja, necromancer or archer.

Each class has their own way of hackin' up the vegi's with a unique playstyle and abilities.

The cat samurai Hiro makes a guest appearance to celebrate his recent greenlit title; Samudai by Geek Sloth Games.

  • Single player
  • Local-Multiplayer
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Optimized gamepad controls

You can also play the game on the Gamejolt website here:

http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/vegifighter/40189/
